function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in rooms with centralized outdoor air systems and no floor-centralized exhaust system","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through air","Mitigation":"Installation of a mechanical exhaust system or use of a fire anti-smoke exhaust system","Technologies":"Mechanical exhaust systems, fire anti-smoke exhaust systems","People":"Occupants of buildings with centralized outdoor air systems and no floor-centralized exhaust system","Owner":"Building owners or administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in rooms without openable exterior windows and exhaust ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through air","Mitigation":"Installation of two-way energy-saving ventilation machines","Technologies":"Two-way energy-saving ventilation machines","People":"Occupants of buildings without openable exterior windows and exhaust ventilation","Owner":"Building owners or administrators"},{"Description":"Toilet lid being left open during flushing","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through water droplets","Mitigation":"Regular checking and closing of the toilet lid while flushing","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Occupants of buildings with toilet fixtures","Owner":"Building owners or administrators"}]}
